history.content:
Faculty/Student Lunch: Thursday 3/5

The first faculty/student lunch of the year will be this Thursday, March 5th from 12-1pm!

You have the opportunity to share a free lunch with Professor Ruzena Bajcsy or Professor Michael Ball. Please access this link and choose the professor that you would like to have lunch with. We can't accommodate everyone, so seats will be randomly drawn and students will be notified by Wednesday 3/4 12pm of the week if they're invited to attend.

Follow-up, March 5: HKN and UPE, in consultation with the department, have decided to postpone this lunch in light of everyone's anxieties about the coronavirus. We will plan to hold it later. Take care, everyone, and get some lotion, so your hands don't get too dry from all the washing!
history.subject: Cancelled: Faculty/Student Lunch: Thursday 3/5
